title: Script/Handwritten Girly Typeface
content:
Hello Typophiles,

I would be in your debt if you could ID the following handwritten/script typeface for a project of mine.

Kind regards,

Paul

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Grease 2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20101220054453/http:/typophile.com/files/Grease%202.jpg) | 84.24 KB |
author: paul.w

comments.content: Just plain old [Commercial Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20101220054453/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/scangraphic/commercial_script_sb_regular/?sample_text=Pink%20Ladies&sample_size=60). Never heard it described as "girlie" before. :-)
